001package edu.cnm.deepdive.sereknitty.model.pojo;
002
003import androidx.room.ColumnInfo;
004import androidx.room.Relation;
005import edu.cnm.deepdive.sereknitty.model.entity.Pattern;
006import edu.cnm.deepdive.sereknitty.model.entity.Row;
007import edu.cnm.deepdive.sereknitty.model.entity.RowStitch;
008
009/**
010 * This POJO is a class that allows for a multi-table join allowing me to recall the {@code row} and
011 * {@code stitch} associated with a particular {@link Pattern} instance. It is not entity, but it
012 * allows for more complicated queries without complicated SQL code.
013 */
014public class PatternLocation extends Pattern {
015
016  @ColumnInfo(name = "current_stitch_id")
017  private long currentStitchId;
018
019  @Relation(parentColumn = "current_row_id", entityColumn = "row_id")
020  private Row currentRow;
021
022  @Relation(parentColumn = "current_stitch_id", entityColumn = "row_stitch_id")
023  private RowStitch currentStitch;
024
025  /**
026   * This getter gets the {@code currentStitchId} associated with a particular {@link Pattern}.
027   */
028  public long getCurrentStitchId() {
029    return currentStitchId;
030  }
031
032  /**
033   * This setter sets the {@code currentStitchId} associated with a particular {@link Pattern}.
034   */
035  public void setCurrentStitchId(long currentStitchId) {
036    this.currentStitchId = currentStitchId;
037  }
038
039  /**
040   * This getter gets the {@code currentRow} associated with a particular {@link Pattern}.
041   */
042  public Row getCurrentRow() {
043    return currentRow;
044  }
045
046  /**
047   * This setter sets the {@code currentRow} associated with a particular {@link Pattern}.
048   */
049  public void setCurrentRow(Row currentRow) {
050    this.currentRow = currentRow;
051  }
052
053  /**
054   * This getter gets the {@code currentStitch} associated with a particular {@link Pattern}.
055   */
056  public RowStitch getCurrentStitch() {
057    return currentStitch;
058  }
059
060  /**
061   * This setter sets the {@code currentStitch} associated with a particular {@link Pattern}.
062   */
063  public void setCurrentStitch(RowStitch currentStitch) {
064    this.currentStitch = currentStitch;
065  }
066}
